languages.text: "Простите за прямоту, Леди Кассия, но ни одна книга не способна охватить весь спектр того, что обычно идет не по плану во время абордажа. Лучше доверьтесь моему практическому опыту".

traits.locale_text: "Простите за прямоту, Леди Кассия, но ни одна книга не способна охватить весь спектр того, что обычно идет не по плану во время абордажа. Лучше доверьтесь моему практическому опыту".

languages.text: "Forgive my bluntness, Lady Cassia, but there is not a book in existence that can describe the full spectrum of things that typically go wrong on a boarding mission. It is better that you rely on my practical experience instead."
languages.original_text: "Простите за прямоту, Леди Кассия, но ни одна книга не способна охватить весь спектр того, что обычно идет не по плану во время абордажа. Лучше доверьтесь моему практическому опыту".

traits.locale_text: "Forgive my bluntness, Lady Cassia, but there is not a book in existence that can describe the full spectrum of things that typically go wrong on a boarding mission. It is better that you rely on my practical experience instead."

"Forgive my bluntness, Lady Cassia, but there is not a book in existence that can describe the full spectrum of things that typically go wrong on a boarding mission. It is better that you rely on my practical experience instead."

languages.text: 「カシア様、ご無礼をお許しください。ですが、乗船作戦で起こり得る問題のすべてを記した書物など、この世には存在しません。そういったことは、本よりも私の実地経験を頼りにされた方がよろしいかと存じます」
languages.original_text: "Forgive my bluntness, Lady Cassia, but there is not a book in existence that can describe the full spectrum of things that typically go wrong on a boarding mission. It is better that you rely on my practical experience instead."

traits.locale_text: 「カシア様、ご無礼をお許しください。ですが、乗船作戦で起こり得る問題のすべてを記した書物など、この世には存在しません。そういったことは、本よりも私の実地経験を頼りにされた方がよろしいかと存じます」

languages.text: "Verzeiht meine Direktheit, Lady Cassia, doch kein Buch kann je das ganze Spektrum der Dinge beschreiben, die auf einer Entermission üblicherweise schiefgehen. Verlasst Euch lieber auf meine praktische Erfahrung."
languages.original_text: "Forgive my bluntness, Lady Cassia, but there is not a book in existence that can describe the full spectrum of things that typically go wrong on a boarding mission. It is better that you rely on my practical experience instead."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht meine Direktheit, Lady Cassia, doch kein Buch kann je das ganze Spektrum der Dinge beschreiben, die auf einer Entermission üblicherweise schiefgehen. Verlasst Euch lieber auf meine praktische Erfahrung."

languages.text: « Je vous prie d'excuser ma franchise, dame Cassia, mais il est impossible de décrire dans les pages d'un livre tous les problèmes qui peuvent survenir lors d'une mission d'abordage. Il vaut mieux vous fier à mon expérience pratique. »
languages.original_text: "Forgive my bluntness, Lady Cassia, but there is not a book in existence that can describe the full spectrum of things that typically go wrong on a boarding mission. It is better that you rely on my practical experience instead."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous prie d'excuser ma franchise, dame Cassia, mais il est impossible de décrire dans les pages d'un livre tous les problèmes qui peuvent survenir lors d'une mission d'abordage. Il vaut mieux vous fier à mon expérience pratique. »

languages.text: «Disculpe mi franqueza, lady Cassia, pero no existe libro alguno capaz de describir el amplio abanico de percances que pueden sobrevenir durante una misión de abordaje. Es mejor que deposite su confianza en mi experiencia práctica».
languages.original_text: "Forgive my bluntness, Lady Cassia, but there is not a book in existence that can describe the full spectrum of things that typically go wrong on a boarding mission. It is better that you rely on my practical experience instead."

traits.locale_text: «Disculpe mi franqueza, lady Cassia, pero no existe libro alguno capaz de describir el amplio abanico de percances que pueden sobrevenir durante una misión de abordaje. Es mejor que deposite su confianza en mi experiencia práctica».

languages.text: “请原谅我直言不讳，卡西娅女士，但到目前为止，还没有任何一本书能全面描述登舰作战时可能遇到的所有问题。你还是相信我的实战经验为好。”
languages.original_text: "Forgive my bluntness, Lady Cassia, but there is not a book in existence that can describe the full spectrum of things that typically go wrong on a boarding mission. It is better that you rely on my practical experience instead."

traits.locale_text: “请原谅我直言不讳，卡西娅女士，但到目前为止，还没有任何一本书能全面描述登舰作战时可能遇到的所有问题。你还是相信我的实战经验为好。”

languages.text: "Patavatsızlığımı mazur gör Leydi Cassia ancak bordalama görevlerinde ters gidebilecek şeyler, hiçbir kitapta yazmaz. Kanımca kişisel deneyimlerime kulak verelim."
languages.original_text: "Forgive my bluntness, Lady Cassia, but there is not a book in existence that can describe the full spectrum of things that typically go wrong on a boarding mission. It is better that you rely on my practical experience instead."

traits.locale_text: "Patavatsızlığımı mazur gör Leydi Cassia ancak herhangi bir bordalama görevinde ters gidebilecek şeyler, hiçbir kitapta yazmaz. Kanımca kişisel deneyimlerime kulak verelim."

languages.original_text: "Forgive my bluntness, Lady Cassia, but there is not a book in existence that can describe the full spectrum of things that typically go wrong on a boarding mission. It is better that you rely on my practical experience instead."
